title: about
bio: In 2022, I packed my bags and moved abroad for a fresh start, driven by curiosity and ambition. I’m constantly inspired by modern, clean designs that not only look good but make sense to users. Over the past few years, I’ve worked on everything from client projects to hobby and side projects. I’ve grown to really enjoy the research behind design: digging into a problem, understanding how people experience it, and translating those insights into something that actually works. Outside of tech, I’m usually reading, watching movies, playing video games, or listening to music. And yes, country music is my guilty pleasure.
